feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: The use of SI prefixes is common in the context of abbreviating large numbers, such as 63k USD or $3M. However, there are also sources, including the BBC, that abbreviate million to 'm' and billion to 'bn'. While some may see a similarity with SI units, this is likely coincidental.
